name: Need for Speed Heat - HTML5 Edition
name_original: Need for Speed Heat - HTML5 Edition
description:
Insane racing game with the best graphics designed to get the most out of the processing power of Game Engine, as well as your bro browser.

We made a game for your eyes to shine when you see the screenshots, not to cry when you play. Lights and special effects appear to be running in real time in your browser. Isn't that the best !?

Using the best real-time 3D rendering techniques, but for the final product, we prefer pre-rendered images based on the idea of our beloved DK Count (SNES). It's a game you haven't seen before made in HTML5.

For your laughter, and if your heart is full of love.

Rate it and Favorite it.
